link.title: Link Freebox router
link.description:
Click "Submit", then touch the right arrow on the router to register Freebox with Home Assistant.

![Location of button on the router](/static/images/config_freebox.png)

error.register_failed: Failed to register, please try again

missing_lcd_permission.title: Missing permission - Freebox
missing_lcd_permission.description:
Home Assistant does not have permission to update the LCD settings.
You should grant the "Edit the Freebox's settings" permission in the Freebox OS web interface.
